description:
Yuma must figure out a way to outduel his math teacher Mr. Kay before his life points are completely subtracted and the virus planted in the city’s computer system goes… viral!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gyakuten no Countdown! Hisaku wa Astral!?
The Turnaround Countdown! The Counter Strategy Lies with Astral!?
逆転のカウントダウン! 秘策はアストラル!?
